pathprefix.descr: Specify server path to store files.

maxretry.descr: Max count of retries for writting into entrydb.

interval.descr: Specify every interval seconds to write entrydb.

iptable.descr: Specify which clients can establish connection with this server.

port.descr: The port fastsync server is listening on.

bufsize.descr: Buffer size should not be changed.

nodelay.descr: yes[yes|no]: time-sensitive transmissions typically use TCP_NODELAY to bypass the Nagle delay.
